item.description:
Click here for info to reserve ypur spot on the guest list. Please provide fist and last name. You must be 21+

You are INVITED to attend a RUSH HOUR @ SPLASH 5pm - 10PM*
Hosted by Bostoneventguide.com and Rush Hour
*Lauren and Frank will be there from 6:30 - ??PM


If you can get there early, please help me to grab some tables!!!


Please join members of Social Fun, Fun with Alcohol, Red Sox Natives and Boston Happy Hour for a Complimentary Food Buffet! Menu varies according to availability

* In case of rain, I will get there earlier to grab the big corner table in the back behind the bar indoors. Also, We will repeating this event every first Thursday, beginning June 3 and every third Friday, beginning May 21st.

PARKING: Limited parking available on the street but you'll have to feed the meter up until 8pm. Allow extra time for parking. T at South Station walk about 4 blocks on Atlantic Ave along South Station/Bus Terminal toward Kneeland street, turn right onto Kneeland two blocks on the right.
item.how_to_find_us: Please Dressed to Impress. Lauren will be wearing a black jacket splashed with bright color and pink scarf
item.name: ROOFTOP Party @ SPLASH
